name: SaaSSessions
0:
”Alexa, launch saas podcast”
”Alexa, open saas podcast”
”Alexa, start saas podcast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: saas podcast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Subscribe to SaaS Sessions Podcast. India's first SaaS focused podcast. Taking a deep dive to SaaS with the industry experts. Are you working in SaaS? Have a story to share? Let's talk.
NOTE:
As soon as you open/launch the podcast, you will be playing the latest episode by default, but you can always find something more specific. Read HOW TO USE instructions below

HOW TO USE:
To Get Started: Say "Alexa, open ‘saas podcast’”.

Next/Previous
When a podcast is playing, you can say "Alexa, Next" or "Alexa, Previous" to play the next or previous episode.

Fast Forward
If you want to skip ahead, you can say "Alexa, ask ‘saas podcast’ to fast forward 2 minutes"

Rewind
if you want to go back, you can say "Alexa, ask ‘saas podcast’ to rewind 30 seconds"

Specific Episode
You can also use ‘Episode No’ to play specific episodes
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
